column4: hello. i have a netbook (without cdrom drive) and i tried to install ubuntu using a usb stick. i have used unetbootin and it worked to boot from usb, but in the middle of the installation it try to find a cdrom drive (which i dont have) and then it abort the install. what should i do?
when are you trying to find a cd rom drive?
I'm not. The installer is... suddenly, after I choose which keyboard layout I'll use and where I'm located.
